original_text: When I cut off your supply of bread, ten women will be able to bake your bread in one oven, and they will dole out the bread by weight. You will eat, but you will not be satisfied.
korean_text: 내가 너희가 의뢰하는 양식을 끊을 때에 열 여인이 한 화덕에서 너희 떡을 구워 저울에 달아 주리니 너희가 먹어도 배부르지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: When I cut off your supply of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희의 빵 공급을 끊을 때에

sentences.original_text: ten women will be able to bake your bread
sentences.korean_translation: 열 여자가 너희의 빵을 굽게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they will dole out the bread by weight
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 빵을 무게로 나누어 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: but you will not be satisfied
